mapper.select: SELECT boardName, boardUrl, title, content, nickname, reason, reasonDetail, inserted, helpId, lifeId, newsId, questionId FROM tb_report ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_report (boardName, boardUrl, content, nickname, reason, reasonDetail, helpId, lifeId, newsId, questionId, title) VALUES (#{boardName}, #{boardUrl}, #{content}, #{nickname}, #{reason}, #{reasonDetail}, #{helpId}, #{lifeId}, #{newsId}, #{questionId}, #{title})
